p: Peer-support workers: The majority of individuals providing harm reduction services are peers. Many of them are in older age groups. According to the strict COVID-19 care recommendations for personnel, the use of these human resources should be carried out with caution. In addition, participation in the provision of services in this setting is subject to informed consent and volunteering. The number of active staff has declined and the probability of their burnout has increased ( World Health Organization, 2020b).
